hero_content: With decades of industry-leading experience in research and development, we provide expert consulting and training to solve your most complex composite challenges.
quote_content:
Christopher Scarrott is a distinguished expert in the field of composite materials. With a career spanning several decades, he has been at the forefront of composite technology, leading Research & Development departments and driving innovation for major industry players.

His passion for composites is matched only by his dedication to mentoring the next generation of engineers and technicians. Christopher has trained numerous teams, imparting the in-depth knowledge and practical skills necessary to excel in this demanding field. His hands-on approach and deep understanding of both materials and processes have made him a trusted and respected leader.

After years of heading up successful teams and projects, Christopher founded Scarrott Composite Solutions to offer his expertise to a wider audience. He is dedicated to helping businesses overcome their challenges, optimize their processes, and achieve groundbreaking results.
